author: Simon Difford
description: Some use a whole shot of lemon juice and correspondingly a tad more sugar. It’s also common to add a dash of Angostura bitters but we prefer the refreshing flavour of mastiha unhindered.
name: Mastiha Sour
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass
